inference: Final Answer: \\boxed{120^\circ}. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth:
Since the sum of the angles in a triangle is $180^\circ,$ then  \begin{align*}
3x^\circ + x^\circ + 6x^\circ &= 180^\circ \\
10x &= 180 \\
x & = 18.
\end{align*}The largest angle in the triangle is $$6x^\circ = 6(18^\circ)=\boxed{108}^\circ.$$
